ComicInfo.Title: Beware the Basilisk My Son!
ComicInfo.Summary: Beware the Basilisk My Son!: Basil Elks accidentally finds the Kree alpha stone. When a night watchmen shoots the stone, Basil is bathed in it's energies and becomes the Basilisk. Captain Marvel and Spider-Man race Basilisk to the omega stone. Captain Marvel gets trapped within the stone and disappears.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-15 15:47:07. [Issue ID 26985]
ComicInfo.AgeRating: Approved by the Comics Code Authority
